main event: UFO sighting reported by a pilot and crew on February 18, 1956, near Orly AF, France.
interesting points: The object was initially described as a round dot, changing colors from white to reddish orange,It was confused with aircraft navigation lights,The sighting lasted for 30 minutes,At one point, the object appeared stationary but then moved away as if burning out,There were radar reports indicating the object was beyond the capacity of the fastest jets to intercept.
sighted object: a round dot in the sky changing colors
witness description: pilots and crew of a C-119 aircraft
